Title: Human, LLM, and Code Evaluations
introduction: We have redesigned Evaluations, allowing you to run human, LLM, and code evaluations in Keywords AI. Set up your first [evaluator](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/evaluation/llm-evals/llm-evaluator) in minutes.

New.description: You can now [export your experiments](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/prompt/lab) as JSON/CSV files.
New graph: Top Prompts. Learn [how to monitor prompts](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/prompt/monitor-a-prompt).
Log and monitor an external prompt without creating a new prompt in Keywords AI. Learn more [here](https://docs.keywordsai.co/features/prompt/advanced/log-custom-prompt).

Improved.description: Variables are now logged when running experiments.
Improved error message display during experiments.
Improved prompt selection workflow when creating an experiment.

Fixed.description: Resolved the issue where the [API playground](https://docs.keywordsai.co/api-endpoints/integration/request-logging-endpoint) in the documentation was not functioning.
Fixed the bug where the message box couldn't be scrolled when messages were too long.
Fixed the bug preventing single column execution.
Resolved the issue preventing row clearing.
Fixed the issue where commit messages were not displayed in the Overview.
Resolved the issue preventing prompt logging with the Logging API.
Fixed the bug preventing Anthropic API key testing.
Resolved the issue preventing ideal output column parsing when importing CSV files.
